sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The death of Alexei Navalny sparked outrage and indignation in the European Union and everyone blames the same person, Vladimir Putin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The president of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen, says the Russian president fears nothing more than dissent from his own people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Roberta Mitzola, president of the European Parliament, calls him a fighter whose courage will echo through generations, stating that Russia took his freedom and his life but not his dignity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: EU President Charles Michel holds the Russian regime solely responsible for the death of the Russian dissident who fought for the values of freedom and democracy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Members of the European Parliament are also on the same page.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: With Navalny has died one of our last hopes, to have a relation between a democratic Russia and our Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And that's what we all wanted in the past. With him goes this opportunity unfortunately. It's a very sad occasion also for us Europeans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Alexei Navalny was given the Sakharov Prize for Freedom of Thought, the highest honour from the European Parliament in 2021, whilst he was in prison. His daughter Daria navalnia accepted the prize on his behalf the white house has been trying to calm public concerns regarding an alleged russian nuclear

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: anti-satellite system national security spokespersonperson John Kirby said the new system was still in development stages. He confirmed that the Russian project had anti-satellite capabilities but added it didn't pose any threat to humans or materials on the surface of the planet. This is not an active capability that's been deployed and though Russia's pursuit of this particular capability is troubling, there is no immediate threat to anyone's safety.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: We are not talking about a weapon that can be used to attack human beings or cause physical destruction here on Earth.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: That said, we've been closely monitoring this Russian activity and we will continue to take it very seriously." According to U.S. media, many experts are wary that the main targets of the Russian system would be U.S. satellites that provide communication and control over their nuclear arsenal. It is not clear if the system would use nuclear weapons to shoot down the satellites or only use it as a power source. Moscow has slammed the claims.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Kremlin spokesperson Dmitry Peskov described them as a ruse intended to make the US Congress support aid bills for Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Diplomats, politicians and businessmen discussed the reconstruction of Ukraine during a conference in Athens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: This will be one of the biggest post-war development projects at the European level.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The European Union and the European Investment Bank have provided significant financing for the reconstruction of Ukraine amounting to 70 billion euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We do have very important projects in the transport sector, rail transport and also the rehabilitation of roads.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: This is important for the exports but it's also important to make sure that people can move within the country. Sometimes new roads save lives because people can be evacuated from the front. We do have water projects which are quite important as well because the water infrastructure is severely damaged and then we do support the small and medium enterprises through the local banks. According to a joint estimate of the World Bank, the European Commission, the UN and the Ukrainian government, the cost of reconstruction is expected to reach $411 billion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We are grateful that Greece is already making practical steps and always supporting Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: I invite Greek international investors and private companies that have a vision to implement specific projects in Ukraine to invest not only in Ukraine but also in their business.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Thank you for your attention.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We want Ukraine to be close to Europe. Επιθυμούμε μια Ουκρανία η οποία να είναι κοντά στην Ευρώπη και ασφαλώς θέλουμε να πάρουμε μια θέση στην ανικοδόμηση της χώρας.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Είμαστε παρόντες στη βοήθεια, στην υποστήριξη πολιτικών και οικονομικών θέσεων και θέλουμε να πάρουμε μια θέση σε ό,τι αφορά την ανικοδόμηση των υποδομών της χώρας.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Η ανικοδόμηση της Ουκρανίας θα είναι ένα έργο για περισσότερες από μία γενιά.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Η επίγουσα επέμβαση ξεκίνησε από τους πρώτους μήνες του πολέμου, αλλά η δουλειά που απαιτείται για την ανοικοδόμηση της χώρας θα είναι τόσο μεγάλη όσο η μάχη που δίνεται στην πρώτη γραμμή.

sentences.sentence: According to the union representatives, the victims and the injured were metal workers doing work outside of their remit. Italy's three largest unions have called for a general strike in Tuscany to demand better safety measures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11

This year's jury is presided over by none other than award-winning actress Lupita Nyong'o. 20 productions this year are in competition for the sought-after main prize, the Golden Bear. This is the last year for film festival directors Carlo Chatterjion and Marietta Rissenbeek, who are stepping down after five years at the helm.

sentences.sentence: La Cocina, Cuckoo and Small Things Like These are amongst the most anticipated films this year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Bill Bauer's Guggenheim Museum in Spain is soon to feature some pop art.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The exhibition Signs and Objects Pop Art from the Guggenheim Collection features works from the holdings of the Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum in New York.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The exhibition showcases the development of the pop art movement which emerged in the late 1950s in England and later in 1960 in the United States. Pop art is really characterized by its use of mass media and visual imagery from popular culture so drawing on billboards advertisements in newspapers. Pop art's heyday lasted until around the 80s. At the time, society was mainly characterized by consumerism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The exhibit is showing at Bilbao's Guggenheim Museum until the 15th of September.

J'ai appris en effet l'affût et je peux y passer des jours, des heures. dans les forêts avec lesquelles il a grandi en France. C'est à quel point on a avancé un peu en solitaire. C'est l'homme et l'homme et les animaux un peu en spectacle ou en accessoire,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Il y a cette position un peu verticale qui m'agace énormément.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Cette position hégémonique de notre espèce sur les autres. et les hommes, au détriment de la flora et la fauna.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Vincent Meunier veut montrer la beauté de la planète, que ce soit de l'autre côté du monde ou près de chez lui.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ça fait longtemps, quelques années que je ne voyage plus, et pourtant c'est mon métier normalement, mais pour essayer de montrer qu'on peut avoir une émotion aussi intense face à une panthère des neiges qu'un lynx, un chat sauvage ou même des fois une petite mésange.
